trans-unit.source: Formats ASP.NET health monitoring event information.
trans-unit.target: 格式化 ASP.NET 健康監視事件資訊。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management> namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management>命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健全狀況事件型別。</xref:System.Web.Management>

trans-unit.source: It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events.
trans-unit.target: 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。

trans-unit.source: The WebEventFormatter is a supporting type used to uniformly format event-related information, which is useful if the event data must be logged and later presented to the user..
trans-unit.target: WebEventFormatter 是使用一致的方式格式化事件的相關資訊，這非常有用，如果事件資料必須記錄，並向使用者顯示更新版本的支援類型...

trans-unit.source: Instances of the WebEventFormatter class are passed as arguments to the formatting methods defined by the health-event types.
trans-unit.target: WebEventFormatter 類別的執行個體的健全狀況事件類型所定義的格式化方法當做引數會傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified string and a carriage return to the event information.
trans-unit.target: 將附加指定的字串和換行的事件資訊。

trans-unit.source: The AppendLine method allows you to customize the event information by adding your own event-specific data.
trans-unit.target: AppendLine 方法可讓您自訂的事件資訊加入您自己的特定事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The string to add to the event information.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的事件資訊的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the indentation level.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定縮排層級。

trans-unit.source: The IndentationLevel property allows you to control how the event information is indented.
trans-unit.target: IndentationLevel 屬性可讓您控制如何將事件資訊縮排。

trans-unit.source: The base unit of indentation is defined by the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventFormatter.TabSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 縮排的基本單位由定義<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventFormatter.TabSize%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventFormatter.TabSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For each indentation level, you increase the indentation one tab.
trans-unit.target: 針對每個縮排層級中，您可以增加縮排一個索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: The number of tabs used for the indentation level.
trans-unit.target: 用於縮排層級的索引標籤數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tab size.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定定位點大小。

trans-unit.source: The TabSize property allows you to control the tab size used when writing event information.
trans-unit.target: TabSize 屬性可讓您控制寫入事件資訊時使用的定位點大小。

trans-unit.source: The TabSize determines the number of spaces per unit of indentation, controlled by <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventFormatter.IndentationLevel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: TabSize 決定每個單位的縮排 所控制的空格數目<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventFormatter.IndentationLevel%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventFormatter.IndentationLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of spaces in a tab.
trans-unit.target: 索引標籤中的空格數目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the event information in string format.
trans-unit.target: 以字串格式傳回的事件資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventFormatter> uses an internal <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> variable to store the event information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventFormatter>使用內部<xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>變數來儲存事件資訊。</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> </xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventFormatter>

trans-unit.source: This ToString method allows you to get all the information in a string format.
trans-unit.target: 這個 ToString 方法可讓您取得字串格式中的所有資訊。

trans-unit.source: The event information.
trans-unit.target: 事件資訊。
